data.fullContent: This website describes the functions, dietary allowance, toxicity and common food source of fiber, choline and phytochemicals. Fiber is any indigestible complex carbohydrate that is usually found in fruits, oat, legumes and barley. There is no recommended allowance of fiber and an individual can not suffer from fiber deficiency. Fiber is not toxic but eating a diet high in fiber could lead to intestinal discomfort from excessive gas formation.
data.answer: 这个网站介绍了纤维、胆碱和植物化学物质的功能、膳食量、毒性和常见食物来源。纤维是一种难以消化的复杂碳水化合物，通常存在于水果、燕麦、豆类和大麦中。没有推荐的纤维量，一个人也不会有纤维缺乏的问题。纤维是无毒的，但是吃高纤维的食物会因为过度的气体形成而导致肠道不适。
